description: State-level data on the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) Part B, including an unduplicated count of children with disabilities receiving special education from ages 3 through 21 served by the Office of Special Education Programs (OSEP).

options.label: Educational environment, Disability, and Preschool age.
Educational environment, and English learner status.
Services in Regular Early Childhood Program (at least 10 hours)
Other Location Regular Early Childhood Program (at least 10 hours)
Services in Regular Early Childhood Program (less than 10 hours)
Other Location Regular Early Childhood Program (less than 10 hours)
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
Inside regular class 80% or more of the day
Inside regular class 40% through 79% of the day
Inside regular class less than 40% of the day
Educational environment, Disability, and School age.
English learner status, Sex, Disability, and Educational environment.
